author: Gabriel_9698
title: Highly recommend: excellent location, clean, good price, friendly staff - Review
text: Great location, friendly staff, clean, inexpensive. A little bit noisy (although this is hard to avoid in Manhattan), bad internet connection in my room (better at the reception area, it was better in a previous visit).
